author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 35-year-old share autorickshaw driver was hacked to death in broad daylight in the city on Thursday evening allegedly due to personal enmity.

Police sources said that R. Balamurugan (35) of Villapuram had parked his auto near Arapalayam- Motilal Main Road junction around 4:30 p.m. when the incident happened. Four persons who came with sickles hacked him to death. His body was taken to Government Rajaji Hospital for post-mortem. Karimedu police have registered a case in this connection. Balamurugan is survived by his wife and two children.
title: Autorickshaw driver murdered
